name: Rep. Alma Adams
tweet_text: Let’s move forward: let’s pass the Freedom to Vote: John R. Lewis Act and give the power to hold politicians accountable back to the people. https://t.co/WxbdBxv9UC

name: Rep. Alma Adams
tweet_text:
As we’ve seen with the attacks on the Capitol and democracy itself, extremists are willing to ignore the results of free and fair elections. 

That’s why it’s more important than ever that we secure voting rights now and for future generations.

name: Rep. Alma Adams
tweet_text: Gerrymandering cracks and packs the political power of minority voters, and unfair election laws target us with surgical precision.

name: Rep. Alma Adams
tweet_text:
Our sacred right to vote is the right from which every other right in a democracy follows. It’s the most basic way to hold our policy makers accountable, because sometimes you can’t change policy without changing policy makers.
However, that right is under attack. https://t.co/IV1shZqmD2

name: Rep. Alma Adams
tweet_text: tl;dr - If you harass or abuse a fellow legislator, you don’t belong in the people’s House. Period.

name: Rep. Alma Adams
tweet_text: Also, I want to extend my deepest admiration and appreciation to my colleague, @RepAOC. She’s been harassed and threatened by her coworkers: other Members of Congress. @AOC demonstrates admirable resolve and composure in the face of childish antics from her peers every day.

name: Rep. Alma Adams
tweet_text: My subcommittee, Workforce Protections, can’t ensure a safe work environment for all Americans if we don’t address workplace harassment in our own House. Censure was the right vote today, regardless of your party.

name: Rep. Alma Adams
tweet_text: No one should experience harassment or threats in their workplace. After the attacks on January 6, which terrorized our Capitol Police, Congressional staff, and us Members as well, Rep. Gosar’s actions are even more unconscionable.

name: Rep. Alma Adams
tweet_text: Today, I voted to censure Rep. Gosar. The US Congress is a workplace, and we are sent here to do the people’s work. Mr. Gosar’s actions would get him reprimanded and possibly terminated at any Fortune 500 company, so why should Congress be any different?

tweet_text: From paid family leave and Universal Pre-K to investments in maternal health and higher education, the #BuildBackBetter Act is an investment in our families. Parents will save thousands of dollars per year on child care and receive an extension of the Child Tax Credit tax cut.

🔥 Monster wildfires and brutal heat waves

That's why I'm fighting for #ClimateActionNow!
